newsitem.title: UK: Carlton up as results satisfy expectations.
newsitem.headline: Carlton up as results satisfy expectations.

text.p: Shares in Carlton Communications Plc rose in early trading on Wednesday after the media group posted first-half results which met expectations, coupled with a positive trading statement, dealers said.
Recovering from Tuesday's near-year's low of 496p, the stock was up 18-1/2p at 517-1/2 by 0757 GMT in volume of 881,609 shares.
"The figures were as expected but the stock has been a bit of an underperformer," said one dealer.
He pointed out that Carlton shares had been hit this week by talk of weak advertising growth, yet the company's statement said ad revenues had been strong.
"There is a bit of a relief factor there," the dealer added.
